title: Change Guard position to 1 open slot

requirements.summary: Update the HeroSection stats bar to reflect the Guard position's new max capacity of 1
acceptanceCriteria: HeroSection displays '1 Slot Open' for Guard when 0 players have signed up for that position.
HeroSection displays 'Full' for Guard when 1 player has signed up.
Forward and Center slots continue to display based on a max of 2 slots.

file_operations.description: Update the stats bar logic to use a max capacity of 1 for the Guard position. Modify the slot availability calculation so that Guard displays '1 Slot Open' (singular) when 0 players have signed up and 'Full' when 1 player has signed up. Keep Forward and Center using max capacity of 2, displaying '2 Slots Open' or 'Full' as before. The component currently uses a hardcoded max of 2 for all positions; add position-specific capacity logic.
